name: Prismatic Spray
description: Eight rays of light flash from you in a 60-foot Cone. Each creature in the Cone makes a Dexterity saving throw. For each target, roll 1d8 to determine which color ray affects it. Rays 1â€“5 deal 12d6 damage of a specific type (half on a successful save). Ray 6 (Indigo) imposes the Restrained condition with repeated Constitution saves; three successes end it, three failures cause the Petrified condition. Ray 7 (Violet) imposes the Blinded condition with a Wisdom save at the start of your next turn; failure ends the Blinded condition and teleports the creature to another plane. On an 8, the target is struck by two rays (roll twice, rerolling any 8).

spellOptions.description: Failed Save: The target has the Restrained condition and makes a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the condition ends. If it fails three times, it has the Petrified condition until freed by an effect like Greater Restoration. The successes and failures needn't be consecutive.
